column6: MAN OF WAR – Part One! In the midst of World War I, Logan leads a daring mission…and discovers he isn't the only mutant at war! B.P.R.D.'s John Arcudi returns to Marvel with Joe Quinones (FF) for an epic that uncovers more of Logan's tortured past!
column8: | writer:John Arcudi | penciller (cover):Kevin Nowlan | artist:Joe Quinones
